Texto: 
normal lung exam.
pa and lateral chest radiographs demonstrate a 1.5 x 2.3 cm right lung nodule.  ct of the thorax (lung windows) demonstrate a 2.3 x 3.5 lesion with ground-glass nodular opacities.
bronchioaveolar carcinoma
infectious process.
primary malignancy.
metastatic process.
non-smoker with a distant history of non-hodgkin's lymphoma presents with cough.
